intro: Persoonia × attenuata, commonly known as the narrow-leaved geebung, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Proteaceae and is characterized by its narrow, linear leaves and showy, pinkish-white flowers. The plant typically grows in heathland and woodland habitats, preferring well-drained soils. It is often found in coastal regions of southern and western Australia. Persoonia × attenuata is valued for its ornamental appeal and is sometimes cultivated in gardens for its distinctive foliage and floral display.
